# OSLMap — Property Reference
# Open Shading Language map. Properties are DYNAMIC — they change
# based on which OSL shader is loaded. Below are the default/base props.
#
# NOTE: After loading an OSL shader, use inspect_properties to discover
# the actual parameters — they vary per shader file.

## Core
OSLPath : filename                      # path to .osl shader file
OSLCode : string                        # inline OSL code
OSLAutoUpdate : boolean                 # auto-reload on file change
OSLShaderName : string                  # display name of loaded shader
OSLPresetName : string                  # preset name

## Default Inputs (Mix shader — changes with loaded OSL)
Input_A : color                         # first input color
Input_B : color                         # second input color
Mixer : float                           # blend factor 0.0-1.0
Input_A_map : texturemap                # texture slot for input A
Input_B_map : texturemap                # texture slot for input B
Mixer_map : texturemap                  # texture slot for mixer

## Multi-Output
numIMultipleOutputChannels : integer    # number of output channels
